game.title: The Lost City of Eldarado
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden within the Lost City of Eldarado.
game.description: Legend has it that the Lost City of Eldarado holds an ancient artifact with immense power. Your quest is to find this artifact and bring it back to civilization.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, a magical amulet, and a boost in reputation.

tasks.description: Venture into the dense jungle to search for clues leading to the Lost City.
Use your knowledge and skills to decipher the cryptic map found in the ruins of an old temple.

tasks.objective: Solve the Puzzle of the Ancients
tasks.description: Solve a series of puzzles to unlock the entrance to the Lost City.
